featured.text: The researchers therefore had to study a lot of cows grazing in lots of different places at different times of day, in order to average out these factors and see whether cattle could act like compass needles.
Whether cattle behave like compass needles.

definition.zh_def: 針：一種細長的金屬工具，通常用於縫紉或注射。
definition.en_def: A slender, pointed metal tool used for sewing or injecting.
definition.example: She used a needle to sew the button back onto her shirt.
